entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 30
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 40 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A 30 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
